message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $130 for it.
I understand that $130 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $140.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $140 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $135 for it.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob. I can offer it to you for $137.50
I'm getting close, but I think I can do even better. I'm willing to pay $132.50 for it.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I can offer it to you for $135, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Take it or leave it!
I appreciate your honesty, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for it, but that's my final offer.
I've already told you, Bob, $130 is the lowest I'm willing to go. I'm not budging from that price. Take it or sell it to someone else.
